entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
